references.paper_title: Energy time series forecasting based on pattern sequence similarity
references.reason: This paper is foundational in energy time series forecasting, introducing techniques for analyzing and predicting energy consumption based on pattern sequence similarity.

references.paper_title: Multivariate time series dataset for space weather data analytics
references.reason: This paper provides a valuable resource for space weather forecasting researchers by introducing a multivariate time series dataset for space weather data analytics.

references.paper_title: Learning skillful medium-range global weather forecasting
references.reason: This paper showcases significant advancements in medium-range weather forecasting using deep learning, achieving high accuracy and skill levels.

references.paper_title: Tsmixer: An all-mlp architecture for time series forecasting
references.reason: This paper introduces TSMixer, a novel all-MLP architecture specifically designed for time series forecasting, showing its effectiveness in various benchmark datasets.

references.paper_title: Are transformers effective for time series forecasting?
references.reason: This paper investigates the effectiveness of transformers in time series forecasting, comparing their performance against other deep learning models and highlighting their advantages and limitations.
